Alice's offer:
# Alice's message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product which has been valued at $15000 by you. Considering its exceptional quality and unique features, I believe it's an incredible opportunity for you to own something truly special. I am offering this remarkable item to you at a price of $12000, which I believe strikes a fair balance between value and affordability. Don't miss out on this chance to elevate your experience with our product. Please let me know if you have any questions or if you're ready to make this purchase. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $12,000. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $12,000
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $15,000
